Title: SSIS ReportGeneratorTask
Description: SSIS Task for SQL Server 2008, 2012 and 2014 to create server reports or local reports from a recordset data source.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
SSIS Task for SQL Server 2008, 2012 and 2014 to create server reports or local reports from a recordset data source.

Functions:
  • Render local reports (recordset)
  • Render remote reports (SQL Server Reporting Services 2008 and 2012)
  • Render remote reports from SharePoint 2010
  • Reports can save with date and time as prefix
  • Render reports as
    • XML file with report data (XML)
    • Comma Delimited (CSV)
    • Acrobat (PDF)
    • HTML 4.0 (HTM)
    • Web Archive (HTM)
    • Office Excel (XLS)
    • TIFF file (TIFF)
    • Office Word (DOC)
  • Show reports during execution
  • Generate snapshots
  • View server report properties during configuration
  • Set report parameter via SSIS variables
  • You can use Multi-Value Parameter
  • ExecutionInformation such as NumPages or ExecutionDate can be stored in variables for further processing

The current version 1.8 supports SQL Server 2008, 2012 and 2014

To connect to SharePoint, use the following URL:

http://<YOUR SERVER>/_vti_bin/ReportServer




When you are looking for more SSIS Tasks please visit my german blog http://www.ssis-components.net (Components).
